channel.description: TCP/IP Model Layers Application Transport Network Data Link Physical Application Layer The application level layer controls services for the applications themselves. Including: HTTP HTTP provides interface between software and the network. HTTP traffic PC > | HTTP Header | GET home.html | > Web server Web server > | HTTP Header | OK | Data | home.html | > PC Key terms Term: Same layer interaction on different computers. Defenition: Communicate with the same layer on another computer.
